project.Heading: Hotstar OTP login functionality
project.Title: Hotstar
project.description: A dynamic and user-friendly OTP login functionality for Hotstar! This project showcases technical prowess and commitment to delivering an exceptional user experience. The page seamlessly integrates the OTP verification process, ensuring a secure and hassle-free entry for users into the Hotstar platform. Focused on overall every aspects of inconvenience may occur to user.

project.Heading: Pagination
project.Title: Pagination
project.description: A dynamic and customizable pagination component for React, leveraging the power of React Hooks to manage state and enhance user experience. This project aims to streamline the implementation of pagination in React applications, making it easy to integrate and adapt to various use cases..

project.Heading: Portfolio
project.Title: Portfolio
project.description: This is my personal portfolio website, built using React.js. The website includes information about my background, skills, and experience. It also includes a selection of my work, such as projects and case studies. The website is fully responsive and custom-designed to showcase my skills and style.

project.Heading: Food Delivery App
project.Title: FoodApp
project.description: This is a food delivery app built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The app allows users to browse a menu of food items, add items to their cart, and place an order for delivery. The app also includes features such as user authentication, payment processing, and real-time tracking of orders.

project.Heading: Taco Bell Website
project.Title: Taco Bell
project.description: This is the website for Taco Bell, built using React.js. The website includes information about Taco Bell's menu, locations, and promotions. It also includes features such as online ordering, gift card purchases, and a store locator.
